comment_body:
It could be.  I think a lot of traits of personality disorders are considered more normal when you're a teenager so that's why I don't support people being diagnosed with them as teens.  Their personalities are still forming.  And even if the diagnosis turns out to be right I don't know that it happens that often.  

So that still doesn't justify diagnosing people as teens with them AND putting it on their medical records.  Suspecting is one thing.  Documenting it is another IMO.
